en_text: Fool! Don't provoke it!
jp_text: 甲種言霊だ

en_text: Cease.
jp_text: 霊災相手に

en_text: O Gods in every direction, I beseech thee.
jp_text: 面倒かけさせんなよ

en_text: Kurahashi?
jp_text: 倉橋？

en_text: In other words, he's here among you...
jp_text: つまりこの中にいるんだな　嘘か本当か知らねえが
google_translated: In other words, I'm in this way or not

en_text: Is it you?
jp_text: 夜光の転生ってのがよ
google_translated: It is a night light reincarnation

en_text: Freeze.
jp_text: 動くな

en_text: You're the Tsuchimikado, aren't you?
jp_text: お前だろ　土御門

en_text: Th-That's right.
jp_text: そ…そうです

en_text: Your name?
jp_text: 名前は？

en_text: T-Tsuchimikado... Natsume.
jp_text: つ…土御門　夏目

en_text: I know you.
jp_text: 聞いてるぜ

en_text: Be a little more proud of yourself.
jp_text: 大連寺のゴスロリ娘を泣かしてやったそうじゃねえの
google_translated: I'm sorry I made a crying Gothlo daughter of Daiki Temple

en_text: I'd like it better that way.
jp_text: オレはその方が好きだぜ

en_text: Guess we should take care of this thing first.
jp_text: 先にこっちを始末しとくか
google_translated: I'm at the end of this one

en_text: Try purifying it with your dragon.
jp_text: お前あの竜を使って修祓してみろ
google_translated: Please use your dragon to modulate

en_text: You call yourself an exorcist?!
jp_text: あなたはそれでも祓魔官ですか

en_text: I love it.
jp_text: やり甲斐がある

en_text: Who are you?
jp_text: バカ

en_text: Tsuchimikado Harutora of the branch family!
jp_text: 土御門春虎　分家の息子だ
google_translated: It is the son of the Tomen Tora Tiger

en_text: The branch family?
jp_text: その手を離せ　バッテン野郎

en_text: Now ain't that nice.
jp_text: こりゃいい

en_text: A different spiritual disaster?
jp_text: 別の霊災

en_text: A mobile disaster?
jp_text: 瘴気喰って回復しやがった

en_text: That kid's got something possessing him, huh?
jp_text: そのガキ　何か憑いてるな

en_text: You guys are the absolute best!
jp_text: お前ら　マジ最高だぜ

en_text: What a splendid hybrid!
jp_text: こりゃ立派な生成りだ

en_text: Only one step away, I take it?
jp_text: 落ちるまで後一歩ってとこか
google_translated: Cutting one step until it falls

en_text: Saying this season has also come to an end
jp_text: {\fad(600,600)}もう この季節も終わりだね…と

en_text: You were so unintentionally nice
jp_text: {\fad(600,600)}君がふいにつぶやく

en_text: To fly as I please?
jp_text: {\fad(600,600)}もっと自由に この空飛べるのかな?

en_text: Tell me
To reach that place so high
jp_text: {\fad(600,600)}目指す場所は高く
google_translated: The place to aim is high

en_text: I keep goofing off
jp_text: {\fad(600,600)}いつか交わした約束

en_text: But I will grow stronger for you
jp_text: {\fad(600,600)}君のために強くなる

en_text: But please don't look at me right now
jp_text: {\fad(600,600)}だけど今は こっち見ないで
google_translated: but now I do not see this

en_text: Hybrid
jp_text: いいね　実にいい
